name: Amanda Callahan
coverLetter: I have no technical experience trimming but the farm that I live on right now does have a handful of plants that I have been helping to cultivate. I am a very fast learner and very motivated to gain experience from whatever I do.  I am currently looking for something in the 9-5 (or any hours like that) Monday through Friday. My OLCC permit is currently being processed and I expect to obtain it by the end of the month.
